title: inta parAmukhamElarA
sahitya:
inta parAmukhamElarA nApai


anupallavi

  centaku rammani cAlanE vETaga


caraNam 1    kaluvarincE nAdu kaSTamu dIrccumani palumAru moraliDa palukagayunnAvu
    caraNam 2    kaTinamaina rOgamunu dunimi mAku tiTavu ceppaka nIvu dinamulu gaTipEvu
    caraNam 3    bAluDaina gOpAladAsuni jAli dIrppumani Ala nIkkumrokka
